summary: A girl moves to a small town with her mom, only to be compared to a legendary witch with the same name.
cast: Sarah Chalke|Soleil Moon Frye|Ben Foster|Christian Campbell|Maggie Lawson|Chad Cox|Tom Dugan|Julie Patzwald|Markie Post|Gillian Barber|Kathleen Duborg|Aaron Smolinski|Carly Pope|BJ Harrison|Tom Heaton|Ron Sauvé|Laura Mennell
title: Te estaré esperando
